alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 1:17PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central White Pine County through 145 PM PDT... At 117 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Partoun, or 31 miles southeast of Schellbourne, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central White Pine County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
